title: Kentucky Senate lets teachers decide on transgender pronouns
description: The Kentucky Senate has voted to allow teachers to refuse to refer to transgender students by their preferred pronouns
author: BRUCE SCHREINER Associated Press

title: KY Gov. Andy Beshear signs bill to fund a veterans nursing home
description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear signed legislation that would fund a veterans nursing home in Bowling Green. The bill would allocate $16 million towards construction.
author: Associated Press

title: KY Senate advances bill to track relief funds after tornado aid went to people unaffected by the disaster
description: The Kentucky Senate is advancing a bill that calls for annual reports to track relief funds. The measure was created after tornado aid went to residents who were not affected.
author: Associated Press

title: KY Senate permits teachers to refuse to refer a transgender student by their preferred pronouns
description: The Kentucky Senate has passed a bill that lets teachers to misgender their transgender students. The proposal was intended to protect the First Amendment freedoms of staff and students
author: Associated Press

title: First infant anonymously dropped off at Kentucky 'baby box' surrender location
description: The first infant in Kentucky was anonymously dropped off at one of the state's “baby box” safe surrender locations. A 2021 law allows parents to surrender their newborns.
author: Landon Mion
